author: lib_free
title: #26 El mayor sindicato argentino convoca una huelga general en enero por la polémica ley ómnibus de Milei
text:
[ElenaTripillas](/user/ElenaTripillas)a [infolibre.es](/go/link/3891566) [#8](c8#c-8) Entonces los derechos que sean solo para los que están afiliados a esos sindicatos, ¿no? O derechos si, pero lucha pasamos de follones ¿verdad?
[#11](c11#c-11) los derechos son para todos. Yo no quiero pagar parasitos...si tu quieres pagalos de tu esfuerzo y tu bolsillo, lo mismo para la iglesia o la monarquia, quien quiera que pague de su bolsillo y no del bolsillo ajeno
[#13](c13#c-13) Vamos que los derechos caen del cielo por desearlos muy fuerte. Pues nada, ya sabes cuando te dejen de pagar a protestar en tu casa llorando bajito, no sea que hagas ruido...
[#16](c16#c-16) cuando me dejen de pagar el alquiler y tenga que hacer frente a los destrozos, los impuestos, las tasas, las reformas y el desalojo privado porque la justicia es un chiste y nadie defiende tus derechos a pesar de tener una de las administraciones mas voraz e ineficiente de la historia.... yo para que me roben y me den de palos no pago dinero eso lo dejo para los masoquistas.
[#17](c17#c-17) Hala hala ya paso, tscchh ya paso, ya paso... Por cierto el cuento del rentista a otro, repasa mis comentarios recientes.
Cuando a tus inquilinos les dejen de pagar y no puedan reclamar a ningún lado, porque Miley les ha quitado esa opción, cuando no tengan a nadie que les ayude porque el estado ya no ayuda, ya me contaras a quien vas a reclamar tu el alquiler ya.
O mejor aun, cuando te veas obligado a cobrar en judías pintas, como ha liberalizado Miley, ya veras que risas nos pegamos.
[#18](c18#c-18) es que me estas contando un cuento de hadas....parece que ignoras que el populismo de izqdas ha llevado a la pobreza al 50% de la población, un 10% a la indigencia y la inflación es del 120%....eso se llama esclavitud a penas llega para comer... en fin éa distorsion de la realidad que veo en meneame es brutal.
Me parece perfecto que si tu llegas a un acuerdo para cobrar en divisas, en acciones o en materias primas puedas hacerlo...que problema hay? estamos de acuerdo que hoy en dia el talento no quiere cobrar en pesos argentinos...pues eso estupendo
[#19](c19#c-19) La izquierda socialdemócrata también es la que ha llevado a Europa a la mayor época de prosperidad en su historia... El mejunje comunocapitalista de economía abierta pero planificada de China le ha llevado a ser la segunda economía del mundo.
Así que eso de decir tan alegremente que la izquierda hunde en la pobreza...
Por supuesto, esta de pm poder cambiar un alquiler por judías. Ya me lo contaras ya.
[#13](c13#c-13) Año 1987. Juan, tornero fresador de Reinosa, participa en las huelgas obreras contra el cierre de su fábrica y la reconversión industrial. La huelga le cuesta la vida a un compañero suyo por disparos de guardia civil.
Año 2012. Manolo, minero asturiano, participa en una marcha hasta Madrid para defender su puesto de trabajo y el pan de su familia en una zona sin otra alternativa laboral que la actividad minera.
Año 2023. Juan y Manolo ya jubilados, uno con dos dedos de la mano amputados y el otro con los pulmones hechos mierda tienen que leer en meneame como un indocumentado les llama parásitos.
[#20](c20#c-20) NO tergiverses mis palabras, pero yo no tengo porque pagar durante decadas la afiliación de estos dos sres al sindicato y financiar sus viajes, ni mantenerlos porque no quieren cambiar de empleo o de residencia. Lo siento si una actividad no es rentable que eche el cierre porque empobrecer a un pais entero no es solución de nada.
Estan que se corren los liberatas con lo de la prohibición a manifestarse en Argentina... Libertad para ellos, los que tienen, para hacer a su antojo. El resto, libertad para morirse de asco y elegir el modelo de cadena y grillete...
Que ascazo.
[#1](c1#c-1) Lo dudo, aprovechara para montar un enemigo en común...
Me da a mi que va a seguir la lista al dedillo.
https://www.altaveu.com/opinio/los-11-principios-de-la-propaganda-nazi-de-joseph-goebbels_1597_102.html
Unos garcas, tantos años vivendo del cuento, la idiosincracia de aquello es que labure otro que yo soy mas vivo y han llegado donde estan, que este tio es un flipado pero lo pueden usar para meter en redil a estos zanganos, siempre han esperado que le solucionen el problema otros desde fuera y ellos la del laburo no se la conocen, aqui tenemos la picaresca alli el atraco a mano armada.
[#2](c2#c-2) También se acaba el considerar delito dejar de pagar a un trabajador o imponerle condiciones inseguras en su puesto de trabajo.
[#2](c2#c-2) en el siglo XIX tú serías de los que criticaban las luchas obreras por la jornada de 8 horas, por ejemplo. Así de patético suenas
[#7](c7#c-7) Hipotesis absurdas para adjudicarme tus delirios...
A mi la lucha obrera me parece bien pero que la paguen los afiliados del sindicato y que respeten la ley y el derecho a trabajar del resto de personas. Yo no tengo porque pagarle ni las mariscadas ni los sueldazos a los sindicalistas.

author: Jamie Theodosi
title: Stipe Miocic ‘potentially injured’ ahead of supposed November title clash against Jon Jones, according to Tom Aspinall
text:
Jon Jones seems set to defend his UFC heavyweight title against former champion Stipe Miocic in November, but interim champion Tom Aspinall has claimed that Miocic may be injured ahead of the supposed fight.
The UFC heavyweight saga continues to harp on and seems to show no signs of letting up with the promotion still yet to officially announce that Jon Jones will take on Stipe Miocic .
Interim champion Tom Aspinall successfully defended his title at UFC 304 on July 27, knocking out Curtis Blaydes in the first round. Following the fight, the Brit continued to campaign for a unification fight against ‘Bones’, but to no avail.
Photo by Ben Roberts Photo/Getty Images Tom Aspinall claims Stipe Miocic may be injured ahead of supposed Jon Jones fight Although the UFC still hasn’t announced an official date for Jones vs Miocic, the fight is rumored to take place in November at UFC 309.
Earlier this week on Michael Bisping’s BYM Podcast, Aspinall teased that he would be releasing a video this Thursday, stating that ‘it’s going off’. In the since-released YouTube video , Aspinall has claimed that he has heard Miocic could be injured ahead of the potential fight against Jones.
“As I said, these are just rumors at this point, there’s a lot of talk but there’s nothing announced yet, these are all rumors,” Aspinall said in a video on his YouTube channel regarding the Jones vs Miocic fight.
“I’m hearing rumors that Stipe is potentially injured, this is stuff that I’m hearing from (my) inner circle, Stipe I believe his birthday was yesterday actually I seen, he’s 42 years old the guy is gonna be injury prone,” Aspinall added.
Miocic is a fighter who doesn’t post much regarding his training, however, the 42-year-old does in fact have a subscription-based website where he posts behind-the-scenes training videos.
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Stipe Miocic (@stipemiocic)
View Instagram Post The Ohian hasn’t fought since he rematched Francis Ngannou in 2021, and he was brutally knocked out in the second round. Miocic doesn’t hold a win against a current UFC heavyweight, with his last win having come against Daniel Cormier in 2020.
FEUD: Francis Ngannou hits back at UFC CEO Dana White following recent Jon Jones comments Tom Aspinall makes a final request to Jon Jones If Miocic is in fact injured and out of the fight against Jones, it is unclear whether the UFC will make the highly requested fight between Jones and Aspinall, and if Jones would even accept the change.
Earlier this Thursday, Jones posted a video to his social media of him throwing his mobile phone in a swimming pool, showing that he is drowning out the noise and criticism of him fighting Miocic.
Jon Jones just threw his phone into his swimming pool pic.twitter.com/czBWYlsCUG
— Oscar Willis (@oscarswillis) August 22, 2024 View Tweet With one last request to Jones, Aspinall has asked that if the fight between him and Miocic does take place, he hands him the undisputed title as he is leaving the cage. The 31-year-old will be front row and has confirmed with the UFC that he will be a backup for the potential fight.
“If that (fight) does happen, I’ll be there, I’ll be ready to jump in with either of you guys for the undisputed title if one of you is gonna pull out. But, if you successfully defend against Stipe in November, I will be there front row, I want you to hand me the undisputed title as you walk past me, please,” Aspinall politely requested.
SCALDED: Renan Ferreira scalded for controversial comments made towards Francis Ngannou as he gets emotional during PFL press conference

author: Alejandro Arrieche
title: Best Crypto to Buy in April: Bitcoin Rises After Trump's Tariff Announcement
text:
Bitcoin (BTC) rallied today right after Donald Trump announced a comprehensive plan to impose retaliatory tariffs on multiple countries.
Starting at midnight, a 25% straightforward levy will be imposed on imported automobiles. Trump emphasized that American companies are not allowed to sell their cars in many of these markets.
Although the market initially reacted negatively to the news, buyers made their way and pushed the price of BTC to session highs and blew up multiple resistances along the way. BTC went up by 3% and came close to $90,000.
Trading volumes in the past 24 hours have shot up by 32% after they were unmoved compared to the previous day.
Solana (SOL) has now gone up by 5.2% possibly as Official Trump (TRUMP) has seen its trading volumes surge after the President’s speech.
The market had been waiting for this announcement throughout the day. Imposing tariffs unilaterally on countries is considered a bearish signal as it could lead to higher inflation. This could deter the Federal Reserve from lowering interest rates this year.
It is the market’s baseline scenario that rates will be cut two times in 2025. If the Fed changes course and scraps those plans, risky assets like cryptocurrencies will move lower.
Although the market reacted positively to the news initially, this may have been an attempt to trap short-sellers as the announcement possibly resulted in retail traders opening short positions.
Bitcoin Short-Sellers Were Wiped During Trump’s Speech Data from CoinGlass shows that nearly $100 million worth of short positions in cryptocurrencies were wiped in the past hour.
The daily chart shows that BTC has now retreated from a key resistance it tagged earlier in the session. However, a short-term bullish outlook is still in play as the token has bounced off a key Fibonacci level.
The 61.8% retracement level is typically considered a high-value threshold for traders as a bounce off this marker typically results in a significant near-term uptrend for the asset that can push it to a higher high.
In the case of BTC, that would mean a retest of the $90,000 resistance – an important resistance level that could catalyze further price increases if bulls overcome the selling pressure.
However, looking at the hourly price action, the sell-off has temporarily stopped at the 61.8% Fibonacci level. It seems that bulls are heavily defending this threshold as a break below would reverse BTC’s uptrend.
Momentum indicators have already flashed sell signals as the Relative Strength Index (RSI) crossed below the signal line and it currently stands 17% below this important marker.
The next hour will be critical to determine where BTC may be heading as a break below this Fibonacci support could result in a big drop that could spill over to tomorrow’s session.
The initial target for BTC would be set at the mid-80,000s and the next step would be at around $82,500.
Despite these temporary setbacks, BTC’s long-term trajectory is still bullish. Analysts predict that the token could rise to $250,000 before the end of the year.
If that’s the case, BTC Bull Token (BTCBULL), one of the best-performing crypto presales of this year, offers a great alternative to profit from Bitcoin’s rise to fresh all-time highs through milestone-based rewards.
BTC Bull Token (BTCBULL) Introduces Innovative Compensation Scheme and Raises $4M BTC Bull Token (BTCBULL) is a fun way to earn passive income as BTC rises. Those who have been in the crypto space enough understand that volatility is the name of the game.
Despite these recent price swings, BTC’s long-term bull case is intact, meaning that it is not a matter of if but when that the token may rise to $250,000 and possibly beyond as crypto adoption keeps accelerating.

author: Flanders News Service
title: Belgian rail unions form united front to maximise strike impact
text:
Belgian rail unions form united front to maximise strike impact
Five of the six Belgian railway unions have formed a joint front to better coordinate their strike actions and increase their impact. In a joint statement on Thursday morning, ACOD Spoor, ACV Transcom, VSOA Spoor, OVS, and ASTB announced a common action plan.
The smaller unions (VSOA Spoor, OVS, and ASTB) are aligning their actions with those of the two largest, ACOD Spoor and ACV Transcom, who have announced 24-hour strikes every Tuesday in April (8, 15, 22, and 29 April). Further escalation is expected in May.
Rail unions announce 18 strike days in next 5 months
belganewsagency.eu
Metisp-Protect, a sixth, smaller union, is not part of the coalition but is currently holding a week-long strike. All unions will take part in a national general strike on Monday 31 March.
The actions are in response to federal government plans to raise the retirement age, increase flexibility for rail workers, cut budgets, and reform HR Rail, the legal employer of railway staff.
© BELGA PHOTO NICOLAS MAETERLINCK
